name: JAY HANUMAN CLUB
briefDescription: The work of JAY HANUMAN CLUB based on  complementary and mutually supportive goals related to the primary means of action: capacity building, knowledge sharing, research, networking, health, education and training, agricultural improvement, and environmental protection with  prioritization of “Right to Service.”.Build the capacity of all groups to promote, guide, and facilitate the  RTS issues and programmes..Facilitate and contribute to the enabling and implementation of different issues framework agreements  in mainstream programmes of RTI & RTS.Facilitate and support advocacy activities aimed to include weaker section as a component of the Country Assistance Strategy Paper  in cooperation with all groups, particularly local people
